short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates and displays the income needed to afford houses on Zillow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever want to see how much you need to make to afford the Zillow dream house? This extension shows you exactly that for each listing on Zillow. You can choose to see monthly and yearly income, as well as change the percent of income.
